entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.4°C

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023
